title: ICE: unexpected panic, from using include!

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-macros
labels.description: Area: All kinds of macros (custom derive, macro_rules!, proc macros, ..)

body:
## [Source](https://github.com/Aaronepower/tokei/tree/bc83358d820a8912bd9f3b9fe1c33e3aacf301d2) & [travis](https://travis-ci.org/Aaronepower/tokei/builds/131674741)
### Rust and Cargo versions
#### rustc

```
rustc 1.8.0 (db2939409 2016-04-11)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: db2939409db26ab4904372c82492cd3488e4c44e
commit-date: 2016-04-11
host: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
release: 1.8.0
```
#### cargo

```
cargo 0.9.0-nightly (8fc3fd8 2016-02-29)
```
